Description.Title: human bile duct tumor from Opisthorchis viverrini related cholangiocarcinoma (CCA) patient-Normal Samples

Comment.Paragraph: human bile duct tumor from Opisthorchis viverrini related cholangiocarcinoma (CCA) patient paired tumor set 1. Clinical information on the patients evaluated in this study was obtained from the Srinagarind Hospital, Khonkean Thailand. Informed consent was obtained from each subjects and the Human Research Ethics Committee, Khon Kaen University approved our research protocol (HE471214). Clinicopathological features of CCA patients including age, sex, histological grading, and pTNM stage (AJCC 6th Edition) were evaluated retrospectively by reviewing the medical charts and pathological records and compared with mutational status.
